text:
Lando Fiorini (born Leopoldo Fiorini; 27 January 1938 – 9 December 2017) was an Italian actor and singer. He was known for having sung songs from Rome in Italian and Romanesco. His cabaret show "Ma ‘ndo vai se il decoder non-ce l’hai" satirized Italian television.
Fiorini died in Rome, Italy on 9 December 2017 of mesothelioma at the age of 79.
